src_original: sa śrāmaṇeraḥ saṃlakṣayati /  tīvraparyavasthānaparyavasthito 'yaṃ /  yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam
tgt_original: 」是時沙彌知彼磣毒惡言罵辱，「我若報言轉增憤恚。

src_original: āpatsyatîti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
tgt_original: 」默然而住。

src_original: yadâsya paryavasthānaṃ vigataṃ tadôpasaṃkramya kathayati /
tgt_original: 乃於後時瞋罵少息，詣彼說悔：

src_original: sthavira jānīṣe tvaṃ ko 'ham iti /
tgt_original: 「大德上座如是煩惱。

src_original: sa kathayati /
tgt_original: 」彼言：

src_original: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /  aham api bhikṣuḥ sthaviraḥ /
tgt_original: 「汝知此迦葉佛法律中出家沙彌我為上座比丘。

src_original: śrāmaṇerakaḥ kathayati /  yady apy evaṃ tathâpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat  kṛtaṃ /  kiṃ kṛtaṃ kleśaprahāṇaṃ chinnasakalabandhano 'haṃ sarvabandhanavinirmuktaḥ /
tgt_original: 」沙彌說言：

src_original: ātmaprekṣā bhaviṣyāmo dharmasauratyasaṃsthitāḥ //
tgt_original: 安住法樂中，應當自觀察：

src_original: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /  anupaliptā lokena bhesyāmo lokanāyakāḥ //
tgt_original: 我為導世師，不染世間法，而於毀讚中，若須彌不動。

src_original: idaṃ cânarthavivarjanam āryagaganagañjasūtre  saddharmadhāraṇôdyatair bodhisatvair bhāṣitaṃ //  [ Bendall ed p45 ---> ]
tgt_original: 離此難事，如《虛空藏經》護持正法諸菩薩等同說偈言：

src_original: varjayet saṃstavaṃ nityaṃ rājaputrebhi rājabhiḥ //  ye câpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /  caṇḍālamuṣṭikaiḥ śauṇḍais tīrthikaiś câpi sarvaśaḥ //  adhimānīn na seveta [[DOUBT]] vinayec câgame sthitān /
tgt_original: 「應入行處及親近處，常離國王及國王子、大臣官長、兇險戲者及旃陀羅、外道梵志，亦不親近增上慢人、貪著小乘三藏學者、破戒比丘、名字羅漢及比丘尼，好戲笑者諸優婆夷，皆勿親近。

src_original: saṃstavaṃ ca vivarjeyā saukarâurabhrikaiḥ saha //  strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ /  naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cânye tādṛśā janāḥ //
tgt_original: 寡女處女及諸不男，皆勿親近以為親厚。 及至販肉自活衒賣女色，如是之人皆勿親近。

src_original: [ Bendall ed p49 ---> ]  vāramukhyān na seveta ye cânye bhogavṛttinaḥ /  pratisaṃmodanaṃ tebhiḥ sarvaśaḥ parivarjayet //
tgt_original: 兇險相撲種種嬉戲諸婬女等，盡勿親近。

src_original: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /  na câikaḥ praviśet tatra nâpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
tgt_original: 莫獨屏處為女說法，若說法時無得戲笑。

src_original: ayaṃ câparo 'nartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmôktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
tgt_original: 」論曰： 復說是難，所謂魔事。 《般若經》云：

src_original: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyâciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyântike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
tgt_original: 「謂魔波旬於未久住菩薩乘者修習此般若波羅蜜多時，起大勢力。

src_original: atrâivâha /
tgt_original: 又云：

src_original: vayam utsahāmo bhagavan nirvṛte dvipadôttame /  lābhasatkāram utsṛṣṭvā sarvaṃ côtsṛjya saṃstavaṃ /  anutsṛṣṭvêmaṃ dharmaṃ buddhajñānanidarśakam //
tgt_original: 「最上兩足尊，於此滅度後，咸生勇猛心，不自惜身命，護持佛正法，棄捨於利養，及離諸眷屬，為證佛智故，不捨是正法。

src_original: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ  prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ  pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /  ulkāpātān diśi digva-  [ Cambridge MS f29b ---> ]
tgt_original: 『復次阿難陀！

src_original: hān utsṛjanti saṃdarśayanti /  apy eva nāmâyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā  romaharṣo- vâsya bhaved iti /  yenâsyâikacittôtpādo 'pi kṣīyetânuttarāyāḥ  samyaksaṃbodher iti /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修習此般若波羅蜜多時，有惡魔來於菩薩所，生嬈亂意現怖畏事，化雷電火燒十方界，欲令菩薩驚怯毛竪，於一念中退失阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
